price: Eyvah bize! Mezarımızdan bizi kim kaldırdı? Bu, Rahman'ın vadettiğidir. Peygamberler gerçekten doğru söylemişler, derler.
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāwaylanā man baʿathanā min marqadinā hādhā mā waʿada al-raḥmānu waṣadaqa al-mur'salūna
